howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.p1: Many companies run promotions using Referral Links that users can share with friends who haven’t yet signed up. When your friends use your Referral Link, you both get rewards!
howItWorks.p2: If you’re already familiar with this system, you’ve probably run out of people to share your link with.
howItWorks.p3: What to do in these cases?
howItWorks.p4: Easy: share your code on BonusCenter so anyone can use it—and you keep earning.
howItWorks.p5: And if you’re looking for one or more Referral Links but don’t know where to find them? Simple: you’ll find them all on BonusCenter!

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.p1: Our mission isn’t just to point out great bonuses for earning a little extra each month, but especially to educate and guide you through the online opportunities world. The internet is full of misleading platforms (over 95% are scams or worthless), so it’s crucial to tell real offers from dangerous ones.
aboutUs.p2: Our team continuously tests and analyzes new apps, cards, and platforms. We read the terms, verify that bonuses are actually paid, and prepare a detailed guide for each opportunity.
aboutUs.p3: Many promotions rely on referral links: some apps give a signup bonus via a special link or code, others reward the inviter too. For each app, you’ll find both the public link next to the logo and the code to enter if needed.
aboutUs.p4: Our advice is to sign up for all available apps and then share them with friends, family, or acquaintances to get referral bonuses.
aboutUs.p5: The bonuses we feature generally fall into two categories:

type1.title: Welcome bonus:
type1.bold: received at signup via our link/code.

type2.title: Referral bonus:
type2.bold: earned each time someone signs up with your link and meets the requirements.

final.p1: Promotions change frequently, so it’s important to stay updated, check deadlines, and always read the terms. Only genuinely paying apps get published: we skip scams and misleading services.
final.p2: Join us and turn every app into a real opportunity. The web is full of possibilities when you know where to look!
